forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a soft, partly sunny sky, a prelude to the gentle embrace of the afternoon chill that will sculpt the atmosphere. A mild northwest breeze dances through the streets, whispering tales of early spring while keeping the air brisk, with temperatures hovering around a refreshing sixty degrees. The clarity of the day is muted by soft clouds that drape themselves over the city, framing familiar landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge and the iconic skyline, yet not veiling their essence entirely.

As evening approaches, expect the temperature to settle to a tranquil forty-eight degrees; the sky will transition to a partly cloudy veil. For those venturing out, a light jacket or sweater will suffice to fend off the cool air. It’s an ideal day for a leisurely stroll through the neighborhood, perhaps stopping at a cozy café to savor a warm beverage while observing the world meander by. Alternatively, a visit to one of the local galleries could immerse you in creativity before dark cloaks the city. The subtle beauty of the day invites exploration, whether through familiar paths or uncharted corners of this vibrant urban tapestry.
